string.text: Hello! I have some mutant parts for you...

Greetings, Marked One! Here's my offer... bring me:
3 Blind Dog's tails
 or 6 Wild Boar's hooves...
 I have customers that buy these parts to make medicines from them...
Greetings Dan, I have collected the hooves for you ... here they are...
Hello there Dan, I brought the tails you asked for...
You brought the hooves? Perfect, I will get a good price for these!
You have brought me the tails... well done!!
Unfortunately, I haven't collected enough of them yet...
Hello Fox, how are you making out!?

These damn dogs have torn my trousers to pieces. They chase me like I've got a backpack full of sausage. Listen, Marked One, can you bring me a parcel from the Duty outpost on the North side of the garbage? Just ask the commander, he's expecting me. It's a good gun that will help keep these dogs from tearing me to pieces. And while your helping me out I will stay with the Doctor. And don't worry, the award will be adequate...
No problem Fox, I will help you out. I need to recon that area anyway, be back soon
Bring you what? You want me to risk my life while you sit and get drunk with the Doctor? How thick do you think I am? Go yourself and I will talk with the Doctor

Here Fox, I have brought your gun... A Good weapon, I really like it. Prapor did not want to give it to me. It was necessary to take a great risk getting bloodsucker tentacles. And you of course know how they fight, I need some Vodka!
Well thanks, Marked One! Sorry for all the trouble. Now that I've got some good fire power those mutants are going to pay!... Here's you reward
Greetings, Prapor, I come on business. Fox said that your holding a parcel for him. He got injured by some Psuedodogs so I've come to pick it up
Well what do you think this is, a post office? If you want it, your going to have to earn it! Bring me a pair of Bloodsucker tentacles, then you can have the parcel. For storage fees, so to speak
Well looks like you mean business... all right I will bring them, if I survive. I don't think Fox will live much longer without a better weapon and I made a promise
So, Prapor, about my health... don't ask. Here are your tentacles. It was hard to get them. Where's the parcel?

Thank you, Marked One! Well you're not a rookie after all. These tentacles are necessary for my health, strong medicine can be made from them. Yes my troubles have ended. To be honest we had a wager on whether you would return or not. I lost 5 bottles of Vodka in that bet... HA!
Looks like I need your help
All eventually need my help. All the Zone uses my information
General Voronin has sent me ... tell me what you know about who killed Fang, and why did they do it!?

Marked One, you're a person respected in the Zone. But why do people think that they can approach me free of charge and demand that I share my information? No way bub, you want info you pay! In general though, I have lately been told that someone has stolen the PDA of Tirana, the leader of the Mercenaries. In general he now, to put it mildly, is strongly upset, much like a flight of furious baboons. I hope you understand how valuable the information is and how much it costs. Many are hunting for this PDA, both Duty, and Freedom, and Bandit wasps, are all trying to find it before the others. And so, I know who has it and where this person is. If you agree to bring it to me I will point you towards the person, he will tell you everything that he knows. And I believe he knows much
Okay, we will do it your way. Where is this 'miracle person' with the PDA?
On the Marshes there is a new shopkeeper. My sources say that he is somehow connected with this business and most likely has the PDA
I will find him, that's all I need to know
I'm back in one piece and here's the PDA. Listen, Mercenaries seem to know too much about where and when I will be somewhere, I just foiled another ambush. Did you try to set me up?

This is excellent, well done! You're a Man of his word! Mercenaries you say? Every faction is hunting for this PDA. At one time or another the Military, Freedom, Duty, and even those egg head scientists at Yantar have used their services to get their dirty work done without tarnishing their image. Listen to me attentively, I've got the information you need. In the Army Warehouses, on the base of Freedom in one of the barracks, you will find LeHavre. He is the one who will answer your questions about Fang
Are you serious? On the base of Freedom a Mercenary! Has the world gone mad? Or am I missing something?

Not so loud, do not shout. You do not know this terrible person, he has connections with many powerful and evil people. Freedom receives prototypes of new weapons through his suppliers. So they turn a blind eye and let him do business on their base. LeHavre is a very serious and dangerous man, always be on your guard. Good luck to you. By the way, take this Artefact it's quite good
Dan! your going to give me that PDA and the only price I will pay is in lead! I know you have it, don't try to play games!
Marked One, calm down! Here take it, I was holding it as storage for somebody. I don't even know what's on it!...
That little ass-hole who gave me that PDA almost got me killed, when I see him he will catch a bullet!!!
Believe me Dan, I didn't want you to kill, but this is very serious business
It's okay Marked One, good luck to you...
Are you LeHavre? the informant has sent me

The Marked One has come! The informant has told me that you search for the murderer of Fang. I can help but it's necessary for you to do some jobs for us, which I will pay you for. Then I will tell you what you want to know
Seems I'm making a deal with the devil, what evil deeds do you have in mind?

Stalker, try to understand, if you want to learn the secrets of the dead you will do what I ask. You brought a PDA to the informant. And from the data recovered we have discovered that in our well-disposed ranks is a rat. But not so simple, it's one of our leaders. Enough direct evidence is not present, so I cannot kill him myself. That would lead to reprisals and a possible clan war. And you, as the tramp extraneous, killing this person would avoid all possible consequences. Bolt is the rat, and he is nearby at the end of the road that leads to this base. If you extract his personal PDA, I will have proof of his participation in the theft of Tirana's PDA. You agree? A good reward awaits you
Aright I will bring you the PDA, what choice do I have
You jackass, you could have given me an idea of what I was walking into! Snipers and RPGs!, here take it!

It is insulting to me, listening to your vulgar mouth. I'm a person with a vulnerable soul and a thin constitution. Anyway, you know that the Zone is full of unexpectedness and troubles. Alright, here's a five-copeck coin for vodka
Well I can't believe it!, Gordon Freeman in person. How did you get here? I heard you had been killed, but that must have been lies

All I remember is making my way into the Zone. In the Cordon I hired a guide from a man named Sidorovich for big money. Then he took me through a valley, past a lake, and into a factory complex. I look at my Guide and see something is wrong, I try to talk to him but he doesn't respond. His eyes are glazed and empty, I fear he is turning into a Zombie. I hear the roar of a monster and I'm scared for my life. I see a tunnel with many Anomalies. I'm more scared of mutants than anomalies so I work my way into the tunnel and find a place to sleep. My head hurt badly, but finally I fell asleep. I don't know how long I was there, a week? a month? I can't remember. I was woken up by a roar, more terrible than I ever heard before. I saw a huge mutant with two heads!. It stood in the middle of an Electro anomaly and was charging in it. I tried to get out silently. But it heard me and began to growl terribly. Without bolts, without a detector, I got up and ran and didn't stop till I found refuge here. I left all my gear in that tunnel, my Desert Eagle altered to fire the more common 9x39 cartridge. The gun is strong, I personally could kill a pair of bloodsuckers in one clip. Truth is, I'm afraid to go back there. Will you find me this gun? Bring my weapons to me and I will give you one of them. And an Artefact recipe
Freeman, pull yourself together, I will find your gun
Gordon, I'm back! Here's your gun
Marked One I am glad to call you my friend. Here take the Desert Eagle as promised
Enjoying the Barman's company? Too much Vodka is a good thing sometimes

Yes, he is good company and can drink like a fish. Marked One I've got more serious business I need your help with. When travelling with my Guide and reaching the Wild Territory, I met a person. His name is DeJames, he claimed to be from America also. Having drunk lots of Vodka, he persuaded me to give him my document case for safe keeping. And in it is very important documents. I need that case but I'm afraid to go back there. He stays in a small carriage in the Wild Territory. Will you go and pick it up for me?
Well alright. What was his name, DeJames? In the Zone I don't trust outsiders
I've come to get Freeman's Case...
It's mine now tramp, piss off before I give you a slap
I will teach you some manners with my fist
Get ready to eat a bullet, it will precisely shut you up
Freeman you will come to a bad end. You sent me into a Hornet's nest. My weapon has overheated from meeting with your goat of a friend. You had better explain!
Marked One, what has happened? I don't understand
Your DeJames, the mongrel! and four of his gang attacked me! They now chew lead in hell! Here's your case
Sorry Marked One, I never knew something like that would happen. Here take this, I hope it compensates you for the repair of your gear
Well LeHavre, what's next?

Marked One, onto the next order of business. One of the Monolithians was supposed to extract documents and deliver them to us. However communication with him has broken down, he doesn't answer his PDA. The last message we received from him came from the Radar. During an emission we think he took cover in Lab X-10. Your problem - to find him and to take the documents. We know that you have received a helmet which protects you from psi-radiation from the scientists
I Doubt an emission has the same effect on a Monolithian. Alright LeHavre, I will look for the guy
I found your Monolithian. Only he is dead, and not just the Monolithian, also a lab full of mutants. Here take your documents
So, the Marked One performs under pressure. A real professional! Well here, take a well-deserved reward
Freeman, we need to talk
Marked One, what about?

As soon as I started this investigation into the death of my friend, Fang, at once Mercenaries began to appear. At first LeHavre, then Bolt, then Foreign Mercenaries have tried to kill me. I have extracted the document from LeHavre, also made a copy. Anything you can understand from it? I in general suspect that it was not sent to you

Marked One, I am on the task. So... Interesting... All! I, apparently, have understood, who and what for Fang was killed. But I do not have enough information. Listen, Marked One, such business, in papers that you have brought in my case, there were for some documents of DeJames. And so in them it is told about a super confidential meeting of leaders of the Mercenaries. The meeting as I have understood, should occur somewhere in the Dark Valley. And so, at this meeting there will be a certain Bland. He should have an important flash card, you need to descend there and to take away this flash card. Also hurry, Marked One, soon other leaders will arrive and there will be no place there to spit at for protection
I will find this Bland and get the Card... I have great hopes that this will finally solve my friends murder!
Here is the Flash Card of Bland, take it

Give it here and I will examine it. Well here... as I thought. In general, Marked One, business such. One of the gangs of Mercenaries which basically consists of foreigners, has decided to grasp the Monolith. For what I do not know, but hardly for something good. Fang was employed to work alone. Simply it was one of those not many who made campaigns in the Zone center. Such person was necessary to Mercenaries and consequently they have suggested it to work on them, having told that orders arrive from various scientific research institutes. And you know that Fang was clever with electronics and helped the scientists in Yantar. But in due course Fang has scented wrong and has started to dig. They have discovered it and have ordered the hit. Who do you think gave the order?... LeHavre! He must be the main co-ordinator of this organization in the Zone. Without these documents nobody solves anything. By the way here to you a gift from me
Thanks, Freeman, I suspected that LeHavre of a bough, but now I am assured of it. All right. I will go, good riddance to that bum!
Good luck, Marked One. Be more careful
How's life treating you these days... Freeman?
Same as usual... here now, there later... you know how it is
Life can be a little warped now and then, can't it... well... hope you're around for awhile, eh!
Well, the Chap, has learnt me? You know, what for I have come?
Slow down man... let us have a drink... I have some nice Cognac here... Our base in the Dark Valley recently - was that your work?
Yes I have no place to hurry up especially, give. Yes base - my work. And your six of Bland I too enjoy. But now I have exact proof of your fault. For who has killed my friend Fang?

It worked any time for us in dark, thinking that works on scientists. We to it well paid, to begin with even gave it tasks on more harmless, type bring an artefact, remove gauging. Though an overall objective always was - the Monolith. We searched for possible ways of pass to the Monolith, and you, that is Streloks, and Fang - one of the few who there happened and knew as there to get. But, probably, he began to suspect us, has started to dig, and has then tried to disappear. We were afraid that it, can merge the information on us to somebody and consequently I have personally made the decision on Fang liquidation. The sniper waited for it in village of bloodsuckers. Further you know
Lines that that is stuffy. I have found the murderer, it is time to the Miner... About what it I? Ah you of a bough... You... You have poisoned me. Vile selling death, well...
Have a rest my friend
Aaa... My head. I should go to the Miner... Where it I? And, I see, well you and... What it, what it was?
It only soporific, do not worry you while to me live it is necessary, well has had a rest? Yes spit you on Fang, about itself see to it better

Spit you speak? Here so to take and forget that was? Say 'Fang, you certainly the guy good, we with you have together worried so much, but now I and about myself should see to it'. So you offer? And so know - Strelok does not betray
Can we do some trading? Parts of mutants for cartridges and artefacts
Basically, I can. First, you need to bring to me 40 PDAs then we will talk
Alright I will go and search for the PDAs. Mutant parts for ammo and artefacts sounds like a good deal
Dan, I have some work for you, I need something repaired
Lets take a look at what you have there
Repair the first weapon
Repair the second weapon
Repair the armor
YO eat, well at you and the price to be stunned! Yes well this repair in a bath so I resemble!
Hold, all works as it is necessary!
Catch. All that is necessary, is made!
You certainly know your way around such things. It's perfect!!
Yes, you do good work ... well worth the money!!
Can you repair something else?
Certainly I can, at me clients while it is small.\n \nthe List of possible repairs:
Well Dan, I had a hard time stuffing all these PDAs into my backpack. But here they are
Nice work Marked One. Now its possible for you to trade a larger variety of mutant parts
Dan, what will you take in trade?

Nobody in the Zone trades mutant parts on the level I do. These hands, feet, tails, eyes and are necessary to nobody for nothing, neither Sidorovich, nor to local stalkers! The nearest place where you can get something for them is in the Garbage, to the stalker by name of Raven, and that's just tails. But if your just looking for cash the scientist in the bunker, on lake Yantar, researches parts of bodies of mutants from all corners of the Zone. He pays a decent price, we do a lot of business with him. Still I would advise to check with Raven and see what he has to offer...Now, Marked One, here's what I offer: For 3 big eyes of fleshes - I will give 3 packs of armour-piercing cartridges 9x19. For 5 heads of Tushkanos - 3 packs of armour-piercing cartridges 11.43x23. If you bring 2 hands of the Controller - you will receive 5 packs of armour-piercing 5.45 mm
Greetings, Dan, here's the eyes!
Greetings, Dan, take these rodent heads!
Mmat, till now noise in a head from this creature! It would be advisable to fill up cartridges, and, Dan?!
Hold cartridges, you can not recalculate - all precisely
About, has brought, the good fellow, just the client on them is available for me

Is not present, the brother, itself you understand, cartridges now in the price, especially armour-piercing! Except me, here only fighters trade in them, so take how many agreed, well and here to you, the gift - to steam of small bottles darling - to sit, relax, while trousers will dry, brains a little to clean
Well it is fine, Dan, I will go, I send on errands creatures, ammunition is painfully necessary
Dan, what's on your mind?

Marked One, listen, I have received precise information that at this very moment, on the Agroprom military base, scientists have brought something unusual. Its not precisely known what it is, but its a complex top secret project. With your obvious skills and dislike of the military, I thought you might want to participate in this operation
Dan, you better not be setting me up. If you deceive me, I will tear your head off

Marked One, you're not being fair! This information is reliable and a group of fighters are waiting to join you for the assault. When you arrive on the Agroprom, you will meet with Arhara and his men. A solid group of veterans, with lots of experience in the Zone. Arhara was once a member of 'Freedom', but then had some disagreements with Lukash. He left and took his men to form a group of 'independents'
Alright Dan I will go and meet Arhara. I will judge what kind of a man he is for myself
Are you Arhara?

Yes, and you must be Marked One? Greetings, we have been waiting for you. Let me tell you our plan, we go through the southern gate and put down resistance in the compound. While you will be engaged in the main complex and will take away from the scientists a parcel. There Ivaschenko, the head scientist, will be with the parcel likely on his person
The plan sounds good, lets go. Its nice to meet some fighters willing to share the risk
Dan, it was there. Here I brought this helmet
This is interesting, your a fine fellow Marked One. Here's your reward. I will examine this for awhile and we will speak later. Yes, Arhara asked if you would come and see him about some business
Hello Arhara, Dan said you wanted to talk to me?

One of my men went into the Agroprom underground two days ago and has not returned. You know from experience that the place is full of evil spirits, bandits, mutants, and even soldiers. He had a notebook of mine that I wouldn't want to fall into the wrong hands. Will you find him and bring back the notebook?
Why don't you send one of your own fighters?

There are only a few of us left now, so I can't take the risk. Bandits and mutants grow in numbers, every man with a weapon is important. You, as I saw for myself, are a master. You know the catacombs better than any stalker. The men have donated cartridges to give to you
I will find your notebook, cartridges I always need
How's the situation now?
My fighters are under too much pressure holding this complex. I'm afraid its necessary to leave here. Do you have the notebook?
Yes, here you are. Your man is dead, I believe he ran into an Electro anomaly while trying to escape the Controllers
Thanks Marked One, we are lucky to have you as a friend. Controllers you say? then it really is necessary to change location
Arhara, is there anything else?

Marked One, there is another task on the Radar. In the red wood, near a helicopter, lies a backpack and nearby a foot locker. Take away anything you find there as an award. The most important thing at the crash site is my laptop, it contains important data! I need you to find it and bring to my brother Yakut
Arhara, the PSI-radiation will kill me before I even get close to the crash site. Also, where would I find your brother Yakut?
Marked One, remember the helmet you took to Dan? It will help you, with it you can pass through psi-radiation
Alright, I will go speak to Dan, but I have my doubts about this helmet...
don't worry brother, I speak the truth. You will find Yakut in the Army Warehouses. He is camped with a group of stalkers, their leader is called Wolf
Are you Yakut? I have brought you the laptop
Marked One!!! Long live your mother! My brother will be happy you found the laptop and that you returned safely. Arhara praised you, says your a professional
I'm glad its over, too many Anomalies and doggies...
Dan, have you learned anything about the helmet?

Yes, its almost adjusted, but I'm missing some information. Listen, have you gathered info from laboratory X-18? There's some data in this laboratory about the influence of psi-waves on the human brain. For certain they have more detailed information on this phenomenon. Bring to me the information from there or a flash card with the data. With this info I could adjust it quickly
I will go to the lab and look for the flash card for you. I can't go to the Radar without a working helmet
Greetings Dan, here's the flash card

Well, let me take a look. Aha... So... that's what's necessary. Marked One, Wait while I adjust the helmet and I will give it to you... The helmet is adjusted and should protect you from psi-radiation. Here you are, good luck Marked One
What's on your mind?

Listen, Marked One, about that corpse you found in the lab. Could you tell if it was really the body of Ghost? I have doubts that Ghost was lost. I don't think a professional like Ghost would have fallen to a controller. I will tell you something that very few people know, Ghost didn't come here alone. The stalker that was with him was almost a look-alike. We continually confused them. You after all hardly remember what Ghost looked like. Do you think its really his corpse in the lab!?
It could be someone else, what else leads you to suspect its not him?

Before Vasilyev, and Ghost went into the Laboratory, we shared a small bottle the prior evening. We talked about the Zone, about the Monolith, but Ghost was mostly silent that evening. He had a look in his eyes, like a predator. He did say that all surviving members of Strelok's Group were being hunted down ... He said he came to Yantar for the solitude, as there remains but only a few people here. Too many Zombies, and Snorks to look out for. I asked Ghost if they were brothers, he told me that they had got acquainted recently at the Bar. You know what I think?, he wanted to make it look like he was dead. And there lies the other loner, not Ghost. Now everyone thinks that he is dead, and that makes it easier for him to hide
Well, you could be right. Do you have any idea where he might hide?

Listen, Marked One, I have co-ordinates of a cache in Agroprom. I will send the location to your PDA. Ghost gave me these co-ordinates in case he didn't make it back. Marked One, go there and see if you can find some information on where he might be hiding
Agroprom? I will go and see if I can find something

Greetings, I have found it, there the diary was. Lying on the ground and its in poor condition so to read written text is difficult enough. The only thing, here, in one place about a person is written... 'You will find it in the Warehouses, near the base of Freedom'
Give it to me, the truth may lie within. Listen, Marked One, you should go to the Bar in Rostok and ask around, I will look over the diary, if I can read any more of it
It is fine, and most in the Bar it is necessary to me, to Barman business is, besides to buy something it would be advisable. I hope you can understand that
Greetings, Barman, have questions...
Ask certainly, to you I will tell all that I know
Listen, you did not see Ghost? Speak, he was here

Such business, Marked One, somewhere with one month ago or more, he was in the Bar and came to me, in general conversation concerns only me and Ghost, but... In general, he asked to find a 'master key', so to say with certain appearance
Barman, do not muddle, I know about the 'master key'... similar to Ghost! Further...
Marked One, you understand, I am a businessman, and the information, like as, too the goods. Give so, bring to me one artefact of Simbion and I will tell you everything that I know
You are more of a 'Pusher' than a Businessman ... Fine!! I will go, and have a look...
Well 'businessman', I have brought you a Simbion

Marked One, you, as always, please! It is pleasant to deal with you! In general listen, yes, he asked me to find the person more or less similar to it. A problem the extremely difficult, appearance at Ghost picturesque so I and itself did not hope that I can find, but day through two after ours with it of conversation, Dolg have caught the music, is not far from the Southern outpost, it somehow painfully suspiciously conducted itself(himself), as subsequently it has appeared, he did not eat three days it, spoke that the Bloodsucker has attacked it also it, escaping, all things has lost also a miracle he has reached the Bar. I in general, all the same, am said lies by it or not. The main thing that it as two drops is similar on Ghost. Well I have fed him, have given out which what need. Ghost Here has come, they about something have talked and have fallen down towards Yantar. Everything, is more I that, another did not see. And then I was reached by the information that Ghost has left in a lab and... Has not returned. Yes he asked, that I spoke to nobody, about a 'master key' so I hope, it remains between us. Yes has absolutely forgotten. Scientists asked you to come to Yantar, they have business for you
You know, I not from the Talkative. Oh these scientists, time to them you will help will not lag behind, but all the same, thanks
Well, could read something?

Marked One, such business, in General I try to restore make-shifts of a diary but if it is fair, results yet not impressing. Listen, you could not help us? We have departed to last emission protection. We have somehow repaired it, but it all the same works through time. We have ordered to ourselves new. But the helicopter is not present some days, on visible because of last emissions, to us on Yantar it is very difficult to reach by air. And we without the computer as without hands. And I would decipher Ghost diary faster
I need a Computer System... can you help me find one?!
There is one person, Arhara, he as offered that to us, but then it was not necessary for us also we have refused
Well it is fine, I will try to find for Arhara...
Hello, Arhara, was here at Scientists, speak at you is protection?
Hello, Marked One, was yes Sly, I to its Duty have sold. So is not present it is more
To me that what to do? Where I protection will get?
Well in general there is one place, laboratory X-18, there should be precisely
Again to a Burer on a visit to go? Well they do not differ hospitality. I all right will go, have put much. Good luck
Hello, here protection, yes it was necessary to run about. I hope knowingly

Oh, Marked One, well you have gained us. And that to us have informed that the helicopter will be only in three days, and we has definitively departed. Look I the Yakut could read a name '... At... Warehouses'. Who it would be? Yes, here to you for the help, take cartridges for sniper
Yakut? I know Yakut... I will have a chat with him...
Yakut is doing quite well... Did you know Ghost?!
Well as to you to tell, I knew it once, but it, speak, was gone in laboratory X-16?
Can and was gone, yes only some think differently
There is one place. Can you descend, you will look? Catacombs under Agroprom you know? And so, I assume that if it is live, could hide there somewhere

An Agroprom Vault you tell? Well all right I descend though if fairly not to be trusted who will want to hide in a monastery of bloodsuckers? Unless only the madman or insane and unbelievable. As I understand Ghost not that, another

Well the Yakut, is not present there Ghost, but I was met by the pleasant company from bandits, bloodsuckers, well and still there were there persons any strange, truth they met me unfortunately not with colors. More shortly the Yakut an ambush there

Yes, it is visible not one you you do not trust in death of Ghost. All right, I know one more place on the Radar. You know where an entrance in laboratory X-10? And so where there it should be. If and there it is not present, then I at all do not know than to you to help
In the Radar? There fighters, probably, full now, well it is fine, I descend, I will check up
You it, Ghost. Yes, you are healthy all Zone have deceived

Strelok's mother fair. When you were gone, I have not believed that you were lost. So much together to worry, you always were the best among us. And a scent, you know did not trust also all here. I am glad to see you

Questions has collected much, well here it is not so quiet, so tell though in brief how you managed to get out of laboratory? Yes me here met very 'amicably', and on Agroprom obviously someone waited. To whom have you salted?

You know the narrator of me, but oh well. In general, the three of us went to the Lab: I, Vasiliev, well, 'Jimmy'. I myself did not know exactly get us off burner or not. Yes, and I went there to trick my persecutors. You probably already know about my 'master key'? There is a sin on his soul, still feel sorry for the guy, but act otherwise I could not. He did not believe that you're dead. There was no place in the Zone where I felt safe. But after the stunt with the corpse, I finally was able to do the quest. Through some of his people, I learned that you are alive. You probably know, there is a grouping of Avengers? Well, not what they do not Avengers, ordinary Mercenaries. Kill anyone they will order. However, there is a mystery. Rumor has it that such groups run by people from the clan of murderers Last Day. Did you know that on my youth, I slapped the former leader of ... According to unconfirmed reports - the clan got together again and now understand why they want to destroy me ... A horseradish hide from them, with no faction does not want to deal with, fear them, even Monolith try to pass them by. In general, I found out who is behind their head - Beast. If it is eliminated. it is possible at the time I was left alone. My boys recently told me that the beast and his right-hand oblique settled in the swamps - where they have a farm on the outskirts, apparently want to organize there something like the base ... I have sent there kids, but without you I am afraid they will not cope. Take it? Yes, it is important not only to kill him, but stick to get him there a list of all the victims, and certainly we in him. The approximate location of our people to throw off your PDA
Ghost, your war my war, your enemy my enemy. So I am ready to hurt someone soon. I've seen people from the clan of the Last Day, so it seems, is not a fairy tale

Greetings, Ghost, in general was possible for Beast to escape, here, by the way, a flash card, apparently, here the list of all of whom already... Or only gather. Likely I can be proud, I in the list the first, you the second

Has run away... Well all right anywhere will not get to. For a flash card to you many thanks. Here take my personal Gauss, I have found it near to the Zone center. It has long enough lain in a Jelly Anomaly, and now it's simply super-gun. Rate of fire is increased several times and also check your pda, I put an mark for my valuable stash with my personal outfit...
Well, Ghost, is known where this 'Beast' is?

Yes, now we will precisely cover. In general he wants to surrender to the authorities. Has probably decided to hand over the secrets in exchange for a way out of the Zone. More shortly Streloks, is now in the Cordon, on the military man to a post. Protection there very serious, to one you not to consult. So you will be waited there by a small group. Children all veterans, skilled, do not refuse their help. Beast should have the list of customers, so find it and bring it to me
I All right have gone, I hope he now will not escape from us
Well that, Ghost, sad, is not present more Beast. Here, by the way, the list of customers
Yes Strelok you always were the best, here by the way take cartridges for sniper. Well the brother is time to you, the Monolith waits for you. Good luck

Hello Yakut, the trouble has happened with me, I here have squabbled with LeHavre. So he has poisoned me in my opinion. A head till now the pig-iron. Yes has drunk brandy. Well so has regained consciousness, they probably have not noticed that I am drunk. Has looked round on fast in pockets, money is gone. Somehow with them has understood, then the Nectar of the Gods, and the things that are not present. Where they have got to? In the same place the base of freedom, turns out except scientists and to take not to whom?

I here on affairs went, to children on base so saw as steam of Mercenaries purely a backpack kg hundred, it is not less. They not through gate went, and the hole there is in a corner in a fence. As they bore it, for me till now a riddle. It is to any person not under force. And so wanted nuts on them, yes was not in time, it is sick quickly they skedaddle. And I think, what to me business to them, not mine, and figs with it. Now it is clear that they bore. Listen, descend here parking of Mercenaries at once behind village with bloodsuckers. There the base at them, can there the Bloodsuckers and will find. At the same time business good you will make, painfully to play pranks they lately became, a lot of our brothers of the stalker from their hands was lost. Here and so mutants flight from the center a rod so also they devils get the habit a robbery to be engaged. Yes it would be necessary to Lukash to tell that for affairs, it is direct not base, and a double-exit courtyard, Mercenaries as at home go. Though that from these scientists to take, as evening, so half of protection drunk, and the second smoked
Well I to these devils that will set brains. Wait, I will return soon

Yakut Is healthy, I have taken away here Bloodsuckers, but they in a box lie, and it with the lock code. Can you open? Yeah, and - senior to those thugs was clearly not a Mercenary - he of the clan Last Day
Wait, aha here hold. Last Day? You're not wrong hour? that group are gone. Maybe someone from Mercenaries pretending
Also it is all? I here the Zone floor stand, on me any one hundred corpses, bloodsuckers the party bypass me, wild boars all legless go, and dogs without tails. Where? Where all mine of loots?
Yes calm down you, Marked One, you has killed all of them from whom now you will ask? But now with empty pockets directly to a Monolith
Greetings all in gathering?

Hello, Marked One. There it is a lot of them and they the present animals. I am afraid it my last fight. I feel, me Ghost has taught to listen to the feelings, the good intuition, the brother, in a Zone is better than any detector, here I understand that it is not not necessary to me to go there, but I can refuse to Ghost. It to me three times rescued life, time apparently has come to pay off
Owls whence such thoughts? Anything we will break the brother. Well, we are put forward on the sly
Ghost, it to you
Bough Owls, to tears has touched. Yes that is a pity as. I to you on your PDA have sent, will read at your leisure
Hello, Musics, Ghost has sent me, how are conditions?
Yes all a way, protection truth too much, but, I think, we will consult
Well it is good to smoke, we are put forward yes on the parties look, something to me not on myself somehow, painfully easy
Doctor, such business, at me already is a helmet adjusted
Allow at you there is an adjusted helmet for the radiation? Whence it at you dear?
We Will tell so, I was given by its one person

You could not give it, I will look, I will compare to the operating time. Understand me correctly, dear Marked One, all the same we deal with this problem for a long time, and anyway our helmet will protect you better. We needed to make last gauging. And then I will give you a helmet already adjusted by us, believe, with it you though to Chernobyl will reach. Well as dear, you agree?
Yes without problems, Doctor, here hold
Is not present, Doctor, I can not yet
Thanks, here not the big gift from me
Yakut, I would like to talk to you
Forgive, Marked One, I is now occupied. Freeman asked to come to it. Speaks affairs much, and Marked One of lines knows where goes, idles
Greetings. You Zahar? There is a job?
Marked One, is one business, of risk are not afraid?
That, Zahar, has desired to joke? We here risk every minute, so one risk more... Do not pull tell

Business not simple, but very important for us. My main assistant Dan from bogs has sent me the extracted trophies. For you, as well as for many, they do not represent interest are parts of mutants, and for us - a way to survive. Deliver them owe three hunters. They have stopped on rest at abandoned factory in Cordon, as while under the bridge where a post of military men cannot take place. There are data from Akim that on my people to prepare the attack. I have warned them, but it is not known, how many will be marauders... Has contacted Bes - that says that all its people are occupied - with bandits there is a territory repartition on Marshes. You the soldier skilled - will not help? You will find the senior - Sepator - he will explain all. If it agree - a gift for me
All right I descend on a cordon, I will help children
Greetings. I from Zahar, to you in help

While all is silent, but not to be pleasant to me it. You, I see, have managed to pass under the bridge. What not to risk, if we will be in time - we will make so: we will go back on bogs, and you - take away a bag and Zahar transfer. I on a peak roof have thrown it - for reliability. Yes... And for service - take while my hunting bow with the device of night vision and arrows to it it is sensitive
It is good. I do not love superfluous blood. To bogs, I hope, will gather additionally. Here lines, in my opinion, we were late - visitors have appeared. Well, keep, musics...
Uff... Was hot...

Also do not speak... The skill of the hunter Was useful... Thanks that has helped. Take away a bag from a roof and carry Zahar. Tell to it that all is Okay, and I to Sidorovich on the way will come, I will smoke, yes to myself - on bogs I will go
Frets. I hope, still we will see. To smoke, by the way, harmfully. Though, it is better to smoke, than to breath our poisoned air. On ecology all nasal... only on the summits confused go...
Greetings, Zahar, here, take the contents of the bag
Here thanks! I hope Sepator is live?
Yes, safe and sound. Where he will get to
Has gained us fine, here take for work
Thanks, class Art!
Is not present, it was lost... Was marauders Too much...
It is a pity... The good Music was... Means, with protection it has not turned out. Well only one - the bag with parts of mutants is whole. Here, take - can be useful...
Thanks...
Here lines... In turmoil I at all have not looked, whether it is live...
If it is live - that you should talk over with it, and after and we will communicate to you...
Has understood
Hello brother. Who are you?
I'm Dan, of the 'Hunter' faction. We've organised small base here, where we buy up Stalkers' artefacts and mutant parts
Do you trade your goods with the bar?
We sell our mutant parts to Sakharov in Yantar, as the Bar doesn't pay a good price. You should talk with Zahar - he has set up our main base close to the Bar
Zahar, do you buy artefacts?

We buy up Artefacts for the scientists. Currently we buy 'Crystal' and 'Meat Chunk' artefacts. For three Crystals we will give you an Absolute Artefact, for three Meat Chunks we will give you a modified weapon. For one 'Gravi' you will receive three Antirads. Okay?
Zahar, I have three Crystals for you
I have found three Meat Chunks, saved especially for you
I need some Antirads. Here's a Gravi
Sakharov will be happy to see three Crystals

string_table.string: You always surprise me, how do you manage to find so many Artefacts? My blockheads only find Stone Bloods or nothing. Nothing this time?!-- Small edits - Sword2012 - 31 Oct 16-->

string.text: Gravi? here take some Antirad
This time my backpack is empty
Zahar, what's wrong?

Until recently, we once a week sent Artefacts to the scientists in Yantar. A group of Mercenaries has been ambushing my men trying to make these deliveries in the Wild Territory. Can you get rid of these Mercs?
Zahar, these are your problems, why should I get involved?

Marked One, you know my men are not good fighters. I'm afraid if we try to do it ourselves, my men will be wiped out. I went to Voronin and asked for help, but as always he answered: I can't spare the manpower. Help us re-establish a route to the Scientists
I will help you Zahar, I don't want to see you go out of business
Zahar greetings, the pass is free of Mercs now
You're a fine fellow, at last we can trade with the Scientists directly
Zahar, you should organise an advanced post in the Wild Territory, so they don't return again
Yes that's good advice, here's your reward
Well Prapor how's the service life?
Marked One, we caught a bandit trying to sneak through yesterday. We found a broken PDA in his backpack...
What's that got to do with me?
Well you're the kind of person who likes to stick his nose into other people's affairs. It's yours if you bring me some scientific medkits
How many?
Can you get me twenty, or is that too much to ask? Okay, I'll settle for ten...
Well you ask a big price for a PDA that doesn't work, 10 scientific first-aid sets? Well alright I will bring
Well Prapor I have brought the first-aid sets

Thanks Marked One, these are for my men. Voronin, the miser, doesn't supply us with these. I need to take care of my guys, you understand?. Here take the PDA, go to the Barman. He has two egg-heads in the back who can repair anything
Greetings Barman, who can repair this PDA?
Yes I can arrange that, but you understand I need a favor first. Bring to me Artefact 'Chimera Tears' I've had an order in with Zahar for one for almost a month
Barman, do you think I'm stupid? For repairing PDA, 'Chimera Tears'? No! the best I can do is 'Fire Tears'
Marked One, do not shout, all right give me 'Fire Tears' and we have a deal
Alright, repair it while I'm gone. I will find your 'Fire Tears'
I have found the 'Fire Tears', here
Marked One, don't get angry. The Senior lecturer had a birthday party and too much Vodka was consumed and by accident your PDA was smashed into smithereens
Is this a joke? There might be people in trouble or somebody needs rescued!. And your drunks destroy the information?
Marked One, I understand the guys did something stupid. I myself knocked them into the middle of next week. Here take a box of Vodka as indemnification
Barman, do you think everybody is as selfish as you? Give the box of Vodka to the repairmen, maybe they will burn your bar down this time! This has been a big waste of time
Professor I should talk to you
Yes Marked One, I'm listening
Professor some days ago I encountered the corpse of a military man. On that corpse I found a note, it mentioned an expedition to the Brain Scorcher

Marked One, I shouldn't even be telling you this. Approximately several months ago a group of scientists, with support from above, obtained a permit to search Lab X-10, which is located in the Radar. I, in every possible way, tried to stop them. Explaining that the territory was unstudied and chances of reaching the lab alive were unknown. I suggested that we first complete the study of lab X-16. To understand better how quickly PSI influences affect the brain and to design counter measures. But unfortunately they wouldn't listen to me. Weeks have past and nothing has been heard from them. I am inclined to think the worst
This is strange, Doctor, when I went to disconnect the Brain Scorcher I didn't find any group there, and saw no trace of these people. Well there were Monolithians, but they are fanatics not people
Its possible you didn't investigate all the bunker, for certain during that moment you had more important affairs. Don't you think that its necessary for you to visit there once again?
Likely you are right, Doctor. To understand what happened there, I should go and explore it once again
Doctor, I have some urgent business
Forgive me Marked One, but I'm very busy. You've spoken to someone in the Scorcher? Here and well, we will talk when you return
Hello. To you it is bad? Take the first-aid set

Thank you, young man... cough blood, forgive I do not know what is your name, but I am afraid... cough blood... I am afraid it to me any more will not help. At me the backbone and many other parts of the body that I speak with you is broken... It from painful shock. Local bloodsuckers were very kind to me and have decided to leave me on 'sweet'
Forgive me, Doctor, what with you happens?

It is difficult To me to speak... khe-khe-khe. Our expedition should reach to burner and investigate it... Spits blood... Yes this France is able to insist... What was... khe-khe-khe... Mad idea, but he could persuade me and some others of the Board. Sakharov tried to dissuade us, but... Money... Spits and pants... A heap of money spent in this project and pride... Rattles, eyes are closed
Yes you all in blood, give I though I will try to stop blood
Already... Pants... Not help... Shoot down... Shoot down me
I should ask
I Beg... Stop... Stop these... khe-khe I can not... Kill me
Greetings, Zahar, is a pity Dan
It here has left one bag, PDA Tirana, speak it to you is necessary?
Yes the informant asked to extract for it
Well so drive 30000 and it yours
Costly? certainly, well all right hold
Lines I without money will approach today later
Greetings, Zahar, yes here took the order From Dan and he has died
You about the helmet? Yes give I calculate. Yes, Arhara asked to come to it
Greetings... has found for Dan a flash card, and... In general of that to do I do not know
Yes give I will try, wait... So... Yeah... Here hold, Marked One, the adjusted helmet
Greetings the brother
That the sad such?

Yes do not ask nasty and all. There, in the bunker, the person whom I have killed lies. He/she is the scientist, he to me has told that they tried to disconnect the burner, but is visible not destiny. The last I have settled

And you trust them? You know for what they here Rushed? You know that searched here for LeHavre? To tell? Here there is a secret pass to the Monolith. They after all understood that it not to pass through Pripyat. There Monolithians like ants in an ant hill, and here time, and you already at a Monolith. Has understood that here it is necessary to all of them?
Knew and was silent? As that it not absolutely friendly
Yes I did not know precisely, hearings went, well few times heard about this pass from people, and here now you to me have told also I about all have guessed
And where to be this secret passage?

Yes that's just the point that I do not know. You know... Here that... Knowingly your LeHavre here sniffed up. Descend It, talk to Freeman. It seems to me, he should know. Most likely there should be a certain plan burner, I assume that it now at somebody from Mercenaries. Yes at me business one more to you is. As with the plan you will understand, come, we will talk
Frets I will talk to Freeman, perhaps the plan will be
Hello, Freeman. Well how are you? About LeHavre heard?
Yes who did not hear, all Zone knows about it

Business is, but is strict between us. And so speak there is a secret pass to a Monolith, through burner on the Radar but to find this pass, the plan burner is necessary. You do not know, at whom this plan could be?

Listen, Marked One, in the first meeting with DeJames I saw at it a certain plan. I then did not understand much and did not know, but you know, memory at me good, especially visual. And so when you to me have brought my case, in it lay not only my documents, but also documents of DeJames. In them that is mentioned casually about what plan, also one mercenary on a nickname of Tamaz there is mentioned. As I have understood, it was someone like the foreman at LeHavre, and just through it and its brigade LeHavre liquidated objectionable to it people. One of these days I was reached by the information that the rests of a gang of LeHavre gather on a dump. Most likely Tamaz will be there. If there is a plan burner it should be at Tamaz. Descend there, check up
All right I descend, if something I will find, I will bring to you
Well, Freeman, I have found the plan. Look, and I something not absolutely understand that
Give I will look. Aha here... And thought. Here look, Marked One, you see here a room where the switch to be? Well and so you will come downstairs, well and there you will find in general
Thank you, Freeman, has again gained, from me kickback. Well all I have run, have put much
Well, Ghost, you as always are right. I have found a secret passage

I and thought. Yes, Marked One, business to you is. It is necessary for me, that you have found rare enough Artefact. It is called 'Gold Chunk'. To find it is possible only near Chernobyl, most likely it is necessary to look in North Chernobyl (in a courtyard). Find me 10 pieces, and I will tell about one secret passage. North Chernobyl in the Sarcophagus and back. You will make?
'Gold Chunk' you tell, all right I will look
Faugh, Ghost, has hardly found also truth a rare Artefact. Hold

Both! So quickly? The good fellow. Here look: I will note to you an entrance with North Chernobyl in the Sarcophagus in your PDA, and here pass from the Sarcophagus on North Chernobyl to be in a room with the Monolith. It is necessary to look a little. Well, good luck, my friend
Well, Ghost, affairs are made, it is possible and on rest?

You Will have time to have a rest still, Marked One. Business at me to you is. Heard history about one Monolithian? Is not present? And so, there was one Monolithian, from scientists like which instead of praying to the Monolith hours kept diaries. Yes not simple, in them a lot of the valuable information on Chernobyl and that the main thing, on the Monolith! As if at it even the hypothesis was that this stone not a terrestrial origin. Well after you in the Sarcophagus to rustle have guided that, moreover and burner have disconnected, in Chernobyl the landing of fighters has landed at support from air. Well those have left a Monolith who on cleverer, Bloodsuckers what have collected to eat yes with secret tracks. Our hero too has set. But here something at it on road has occurred that it has not carried away the diaries with itself, and has hidden. My people have found it, yes have shaken properly, in general it has broken up, I will tell on truth, I wanted to catch for a long time these diaries, to me about them my person from a Monolith told. And so it has hidden them in three different places in Chernobyl, in a courtyard. You understand about what I will ask? Yes it should is necessary to descend and bring their these diaries to be 3 pieces. You will make?
Eat, Ghost, and I have gathered for rest! Well it is fine, I descend. Well
Well, Ghost, was I there. Here hold 3 diaries as promised
Give I will look. Aha, interesting reading matter. Well, Marked One, business necessary has made, now and can have a rest. Good luck, you the brother!
Hello, who are you guys?
Hello Marked One, We are from the group 'Clear sky', this territory is considered ours
I understand

Though the territory is considered ours, a lot of key points are held by strong groups of bandits. I sent one of my men to observe their camp nearby, but he has not returned. I fear he has been captured or maybe even killed. The men believe that our man is still alive and want to make a rescue attempt. As you can see we are few in number and I have a twisted ankle and can't lead the attack. You are an obviously skilled stalker. If you will lead this attack, I will be in your debt
I will gladly help you, can you spare any ammo or medkits?
Our first-aid sets are few but take this ammo
I can use all the ammo I can get
Here take this, good luck to you guys
Are you Okay?
Yes, I'm a little beat up but nothings broken...
How did you get captured?

I was watching the bandit camp and nothing was really happening so I decided to wash my socks. I put my weapon down and started cleaning when I heard a bloodsucker roar. It was after me so I ran, and in my panic I ran into this base and became a captive. The bandits were howling with laughter at me, it was quite humiliating
Yes, well we need to get out of here before any more bandits arrive
I got your man out, he's safe now
Here thanks, listen...if you go to our main base, please don't mention this
And where's your base?

It's not to far from here, you go on a straight line past the church, then past a tower, and then you will see our outpost in a small farm, behind that is a portal, it takes you to our base. Wait, I will put it your PDA an approximate location of the farm
I understand, thanks. What about a reward?
I've nearly forgotten, here you are
What's going on...?
One more thief caught, it was a good idea to set that trap. You think you can just walk in anywhere you like and take what you want?
Listen brother, in the Zone practically all houses are owner-less. If I knew this place had occupants I would not have touched anything
This bog has become infested with thieves, you can't turn your back for a minute! ...
Brother listen, I'm no thief. What do I have to do to prove it to you?
Your going to have to do a job for us! or become frog food...
What job are you talking about?
Nearby is an Artefact container, we need you to retrieve it...
So what's the catch? Mutants, Zombies, or Chimera?
It's nothing like that, an anomaly has formed a portal around the container. We need you to find a way to get it
How will I find a way?
Its not my problem
Can you spare any cartridges or first-aid sets
I wont go, sorry
Okay then
That was a little tricky but here it is, the 'container'
I didn't expect you to return. I thought you would run away
I told you I was no thief, do you believe me now?
Yes, I believe you. Here, this has all been a misunderstanding
Why do you live in the middle of the marsh?

Why?, I grew up not far from here. When all this madness, called the Zone, began I was conscripted into a local protection group. I had not long been married and was expecting my first-born. I was stationed on the perimeter, the Zone wasn't as large then. And here it comes... The letter, my wife has radiation sickness. My village was lied to by the government who told them it was safe to stay there. I have to go and see my wife, but the young officer denies my request. I lost my mind and grabbed my weapon and shot down all who tried to stop me. I walked into the hospital with my clothes covered in blood, the AK-47 in my hands. There my Grandma sat, and I ask 'Where is my Katka', and she points to the sign: 'Mortuary', I... I go in there. There she lies... So BEAUTIFUL
kalmyak please calm down

It was so quiet, and then, beside Katka, I found the baby so small, pink cheeks, and eyes same as me. I held his lifeless body to my chest and slumped into a corner and wept. Sat there for I don't know how long. The military Police came to arrest me, I didn't resist. I was taken back to the camp and locked in a cell
Then what happened?

Next day a big group of Mutants attacked our section of the perimeter and broke through the defence. Gunfire everywhere, screams and roars, panic everywhere. The guards had fled, leaving me to my fate. My comrade Fedor came to my rescue and shot the lock open. He handed me a weapon and told me to run. Since then the Zone has been my home, I have nothing to go back to. Here I make ointments out of Mutant Glands and local plant life, there healing properties are amazing. If you ever need some I trade for vodka or cigarettes
Life has not been fair to you kalmyak. The truth is, that's what brought me to your camp; to buy some ointment
I will not tell you the recipe. Simply remember, it reduces radiation and stops bleeding
Greetings kalmyak, I've come for some ointment
You have vodka or cigarettes? Remember, one jar of ointment, for 3 bottles of Vodka, or 3 packs of cigarettes
Here are the cigarettes
Here's some vodka
Well, maybe next time
Vasily, can you take a look at this
It needs a little work
Repair the first weapon
Repair the second weapon
Repair the armor
I don't have that kind of money
Well here look as the newcomer
How do you even wear this suit in this condition? I will need to change all the armor plates
It's quite good, I thank you
Now it's even better, than when it was new
Can you take a look at something else?
Yes please that there at us:
Are you the twin brother of Sidorovich?

What!!, I've been in this Zone from the very beginning. And you can tell Sidorovich that one day I will feed him to the local marsh giant. Do you know who the first was to supply arms in the Zone? Me that's who!!! I was the first trader who could organise deliveries of everything, both products, and weapons, and medicines. Yes the Barman was my assistant. All business with the fighters was in these hands. But that Son of a dog managed to bribe major Serebrjannikova, and all who were connected with me departed. It wasn't long before this 'rat' had me pushed out of my bunker, yes-yes the same bunker where now this hamster lives. Together with people like Borov he had me thrown out onto the street. I'm still alive though, much to the disapointment of Sidorovich. But here there are kind people. I have survived, though I have a bad limp. But I will return someday and spit on his vile corpse!
Vasily that's some story, I didn't mean any disrespect. Now that we have got that out of the way, do you do repairs?
Yes this is my shop, but I can't get anything done in my condition
And what's wrong?
My Foot aches, especially at night. The wound doesn't heal... So bad that it keeps me from doing my job
Well, can I help?
Yes there is a local man, kalmyak, who makes these fine ointments. Ive had some before, but now I'm in such bad shape that I can't make the trip myself
I will go and get the ointments for you
Well, if you will get me 3 jars of ointment then I could start back to work
Greetings, Vasily, get ready to dance
Again you joke. I cant even stand up
Vasily, I don't joke, I have found what was promised. Here take 3 ointments as agreed
Well, for me, you will be my best client, I always without turn will serve you
Hello Clerik, why do you look so gloomy?

Five years ago I found out I had an ulcer, well I never got treated. I just took something for the pain and I could bear it. In the last couple of months it's gotten unbearable. The kalmyak gave me some ointment but it doesnt work on ulcers
What can I do to help?
Bring to me a 'soul' artefact, its a known cure for ulcers. I will reward you with the kalmyaks ointment
I will try to help
Clerik, have you forgotten about our arrangment?
You mean about the ointment? I Remember. You have the artefact?
Here it is
Well thanks, heres 3 jars of ointment
Hello, are you the leader of this faction?

Well, for the last six months, yes I am. We are the faction 'Clear sky'. Our purpose is to study the Zone, but not like other scientists. More truly, we have different interests and a different vision of it's future
And in what way are you different? In my opinion, all the problems that the Zone poses to mankind are because of scientists

Yes, the majority, but not all. There are fanatics like the Monolith type. There are others, whos intentions are not clear... We are not fanatics, we don't pray to anybody, but also we have not come here to get rich. We really study the Zone, we don't answer to any goverment, that's the main difference. Its both our advantage, and also a disadvantage
And so you have little faith in the people in power

Yes actually, but we are ready to co-operate with them. That's if they have the right intentions. But, I think, their scientific research is still focused on producing cheap electric power and even worse the production of new weapons of mass destruction. We, most of all, are afraid of that. In a Zone full of vicious mutants and deadly anomalies, Man is still the most dangerous
So you absolutely don't communicate with other scientists in any way?

Well why should we? We support informal contacts to some scientists, in particular with professor Kruglov. We are not rich, and sometimes we don't have the necessary equipment. Here we do mostly field work. At a stage when a laboratory is required, we contact the scientists. By the way, do you want to work for science?
What kind of work?
Lately, we have observed a certain mutation among a species of mutant. We don't know how its all connected. We don't have any specimans for research
What kind of mutant are you talking about?
In the northwest of the marsh we have found a different type of controller. It's necessary to get a part of this mutant. We need to examine its brain, I think you understand what needs to be done
Well, I'm not against the work of science, give me the data and I will go search
I brought the brain of the controller, you want to see it?
Let's take a look... Yes, an unusual copy. Very large
Thats the job done, what kind of reward do I get for dragging this big melon all the way across the marsh

A pair of red bloodsucker tentacles
A red burer's hand

The first time I've see such an interesting copy. Yes, this is for you
Sviblov, what's on your mind?
I want to start sending the men on regular patrols, but we lack the firepower to deal with large mutants
Do you have any ideas?

I do know where there is a PKM heavy machine gun. When my men patrolled near the abandoned farm the bandits, who have recently occupied the place, opened fire on them with the weapon. We are not as strong as we were before our unsuccessful attempt to break through to the Zone center. We lost our founder, Lebedev, and the majority of our veterans in that operation. Bandits have taken advantage of our weakness and control key points in the marsh. We somehow manage to hold this base and the approaches, also the 'Hunters' have helped us. If you can steal this machine gun it well help solve our problems. But I need you to do it with stealth
So you suggest I remain unseen?
I have no love for bloodshed, we only use our weapons as a last resort. So try to get it without being noticed. One of my men already waits for you, talk with him. he will tell you all the details
Greetings, how are you doing?

Greetings, you were sent by Sviblova? Their strength and positions are as follows, seven: four in the street and three more in the building. As you will make your the way onto the farm - search for a backpack, they store the weapon in it
Your not going with me?
Together, we would make too much noise
Well, then wait for me here
I bought the weapon
What happened?
Things didn't go quite as planned. During the most interesting moment 'Hunters' arrived and a gunfight ensued. But I managed to get the machine gun
I'm glad you were successful and came back unharmed. Here take this as a gift
Can I help you?
Yes, I wanted to ask if you have seen any Monolithians? I mean here, on the bogs
As far as I know, they are not present
We have evidence that they are here, but don't know how they are infiltrating. They don't usually poke their nose south of the Radar. This really troubles me, these fanatics are devils
What do you think they are up to??
With these brainless fanatics anythings possible. They didn't come here for artefacts. Listen, theres a man I would like you to meet
Who?, tell me about him first

His name is Cat, a smart guy who likes to keep a low profile, former KGB. He said he found something, I didn't press him for details. You should go and see what hes found. I will put his location on your PDA...
Hello, are you Cat?
Yes I'm Cat, has Dan sent you? I asked him to find someone with a bit of common sense, and he sends a rookie
Watch your mouth! If you want to keep your teeth!
Woah...camn down... sorry, I've been waiting here for Dan to send some help. I hope your ready to deal with a dose of high radiation
What are you talking about?

Dan spoke to you about the Monolithians? I was the first to have noticed something was wrong. The Monolith have become more active. At first they were sighted on the Agroprom, then I personally saw them in the Dark Valley. I've also tracked them directly to the Radar, I had to abort that recon operation as I got a bad case of radiation sickness. I was not ready for such a campaign. Since then my health has failed. Now I have seen them here, one of them has died in a highly radioactive Zone. We need to search the corpse for some information. Believe me, if these fanatics have conceived something, things could end badly for all of us
Why should I believe anything you say, you agents leave a trail of innocent bodies wherever you go. I think I should rise and leave or first put a bullet in your forehead

You are right, I served in the KGB. Enough bad things have happened to me. I had to disappear and where else better than the Zone. The only thing waiting for me out in the world is a bullet in the temple, or cyanide in my coffee, it all depends on the imagination of my 'friends'. The Zone is my home now, so that's why I want to find out what the Monolith are up to
Well, let's assume I believe you. What's next?

Well first of all we need to examine that body. I was observing the 3 Monolithians marking a map. They went in different directions, I followed one. He went through a radioactive Zone and was quickly overcome and collapsed. Like I already explained before I would go myself but for me it's certain death. My system just cant handle the trauma yet and I would be dead in minutes

They have marked here one place, one more place in the southwest, here are figures, here are measurements - height, width and length. And here the rest... Alright, I now go to the bar at camp 'Clear Sky' to think about what we should do. Let's go, we will settle our affairs there

How will we find them?

Here on base 'Clear sky' they have the equipment that might help us find the remaining Monolithians.
